SEARCH

Class MedicineReminderManager

java.lang.Object
MedicineReminderManager
public class MedicineReminderManager extends Object
A class which can store multiple MedicineReminders, as well as performing CRUD operations on the database. The MedicineReminderManager can record new MedicineReminders, retrieve them, update them, and delete them.

      public MedicineReminderManager()

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if successful

    • deleteReminder

      public boolean deleteReminder(int id)
      Removes a MedicineReminder from the database, based on the reminder's ID
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the reminder to remove
      Returns:
      True if successful.

      public boolean updateReminder(MedicineReminder reminder)

      Parameters:
      reminder - The MedicineReminder to base the update on
      Returns:
      True if successful

      Returns:
